Description: A weighted Gi used for training
A red pole that can extend length to the users need
An energy wave that can be released from users hands.
Seven magical balls that can be used to summon the Eternal Dragon for a wish.
A device that allows one to track and locate the Dragon Balls.
Kenshin Himura is a former assassin turned wanderer.
A LightSaber is a powerful weapon of the Jedi.
